title: How to estimate the variance for sample size calculations - Quora

response.answer_text: I usually run at it this way: I try to find prior published data that fits your population as closely as possible and use thatIf I don’t have historical data, I look to see if I can obtain it directly by measuring it myselfIf that’s not practical, I’ll then seek out a couple Key Opinion Leaders (what we used to call “experts”) and ask them what a good number is
